resources.string: We All Knew You Would Fail
These questions will help you in interviews that require knowledge of C#, the .NET Framework, and Object Oriented Programming. *This* is the About section. It will be about…what the app, is…about…

Okay. Here's the deal. No, I am not a troll. Yes, I do want you to answer three questions for me. Why? Well, because for your own good. That's why. You're already a better person than you were at the beginning of this sentence.

Select what you believe to be the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, I will advance you to the next question.

If you get the answer wrong, you end!

I mean your game ends. You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
I mastered the C# OOP QUIZ OF DAVID with %1$d/%2$d correct answers!\n\nhttps://drive.google.com/open?id=1eXBNAOTQFuVdmk7pAW_ksayq6F0xioeY
